mapper.select: select d.deptno as dept_deptno, d.dname as dept_dname, d.loc as dept_loc, e.empno as emp_empno, e.ename as emp_ename, e.job as emp_job, e.mgr as emp_mgr, e.hiredate as emp_hiredate, e.sal as emp_sal, e.comm as emp_comm, e.deptno as emp_deptno from dept d left outer join emp e on e.deptno = d.deptno

select d.deptno as dept_deptno, d.dname as dept_dname, d.loc as dept_loc, e.empno as emp_empno, e.ename as emp_ename, e.job as emp_job, e.mgr as emp_mgr, e.hiredate as emp_hiredate, e.sal as emp_sal, e.comm as emp_comm, e.deptno as emp_deptno from dept d left outer join emp e on e.deptno = d.deptno where d.deptno = #{code}
mapper.insert: insert into dept ( deptno, dname, loc, ) values ( #{deptno}, #{dname}, #{loc}, )
